SELECT 
  'database' as service,
  CASE 
    WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public') > 0 
    THEN 'healthy' 
    ELSE 'unhealthy' 
  END as status,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "Appointment" WHERE "createdAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day') as appointments_today,
  NOW() as checked_at
